title: Vitamin K2 (MK-7) + D3 5000 IU with BioPerine & Calcium | Bone Health & Immune Support Supplement | Enhanced Absorption Formula for Heart & Bone Strength - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Vitamin K2 + D3 with BioPerine - Superior Bone & Immune Support

Optimize your bone health and immune function with our Vitamin K2 (MK-7) + D3 5000 IU supplement enhanced with BioPerine® for maximum absorption. This synergistic formula combines the most bioavailable forms of vitamins K2 and D3 with calcium to support strong bones, cardiovascular health, and immune system function.

Key Benefits

  • Bone Health & Density: Vitamin D3 enhances calcium absorption while K2 (MK-7) directs calcium to bones and teeth, preventing arterial calcification
  • Immune System Support: High-potency Vitamin D3 (5000 IU) supports immune cell function and overall immunity
  • Cardiovascular Health: Vitamin K2 as MK-7 helps keep arteries clear and flexible by preventing calcium buildup
  • Enhanced Absorption: BioPerine® black pepper extract increases nutrient bioavailability and absorption
  • Calcium Utilization: 210mg of calcium works synergistically with K2 and D3 for optimal bone mineralization
  • Mood & Energy Support: Vitamin D3 supports healthy mood and energy levels

Premium Ingredients

  • Vitamin D3 (5000 IU): Cholecalciferol, the most bioavailable form of vitamin D, supports calcium absorption, immune function, and bone health
  • Vitamin K2 (100 mcg as MK-7): The superior form of vitamin K that activates proteins responsible for calcium metabolism and cardiovascular health
  • Calcium (210mg): Essential mineral for bone structure and strength
  • BioPerine® (5mg): Patented black pepper extract that enhances nutrient absorption by up to 30%

Suggested Use: Take 1 veggie capsule daily with a meal containing healthy fats for optimal absorption.

Quality Assurance: Made with premium ingredients. Vegetarian capsules. Third-party tested for purity and potency.
shortDescriptionHtml: Support bone health and immunity with Vitamin K2 (MK-7) + D3 5000 IU with BioPerine®. Enhanced absorption formula with calcium for strong bones, cardiovascular health, and immune support. 60 veggie capsules.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 1 Veggie Capsule
Servings Per Container: 60

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol) 5000 IU 1250%
Vitamin K2 (mk-7) 100 mcg 80%
Calcium (as Calcium Carbonate) 210 mg 15%
BioPerine® (Black Pepper Fruit Extract) 5 mg †

† Daily Value (DV) not established

Other Ingredients: Cellulose (vegetable capsule).
